source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT Grade__c, MemberBillingGrade__c, accountid,EOMONTH(GETDATE())  as MonthDate, Heirarchy =NULL,   subsegments = NULL
  ,   category='continuing'  from [salesforce].[Contract]    where  currentmembership__c =1
    and  Status IN ('Active Financial') 	and accountid not in  ( select Newmembers  from  [membership].[members_renew12months_A]('2024-02-29')  )
   and accountid not in  ( select Newmembers from   [membership].[members_new12month_A]('2024-02-29')  )
